results.title: Vector DB round-up: performance & cost tradeoffs
results.snippet: A comparative review of Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant, and pgvector with recall vs. latency curves.

results.title: Weaviate adds hybrid search improvements
results.snippet: Hybrid BM25+vector search improves relevance on sparse queries.

results.title: Qdrant introduces quantization features
results.snippet: New product quantization reduces memory footprint by 4x with minimal recall loss.
